TopicTitle: How many hours have you spent playing KSP?

Articles.Content: I just hit 100 hours, and I've barely scratched the surface.
Been playing for almost a year now. I still play like it's going out of stock.
To much yet at the same time not enough.

510 as of last night

Edit: this was from since the steam option was enabled. Started playing when 0.18 released.

Edited October 24, 2013 by superm18

Probably 1000+, I always played KSP non-steam so I don't know.

As of October, I have played 46 hours on steam.
I think I was 56 hours on steam last time I checked. To be honest, as much as I like KSP, I'd be a little horrified if I'd invested over 500 hours into it.
I don't know for sure, as I don't use Steam, but I must be in the high numbers around 500+
No idea (store version here), but lots. >>100, maybe >1000.
I can't honestly say. It's been more than a year already, so if I assume 4hrs a session, 3 times a week, that's about 624hrs. could be much higher.
Too much time... XD

200 hours on steam (213)

About 780 off steam (been playing since 0.15)
last time I checked it was a little below 50 hours in steam. And that was before .22 came out and I sunk another weekend into it
about 490 hours the last time I looked, I voted 500-1000, because its probably past that now.

Since i started playing on 9/4/2012 its over a year sooo.

3000 hours give or take?
I play off and on, I think I'm between 50-100 by now.
Wow. Is there still stuff to do after 1000+ hours?
Last i saw (prior to .22 dropping) i was at 140+ hours. Came in just after .21 hit on steam
Pretty sure I don't want to know. I'm sure it's somewhere between 1000 and "For god's sake, go outside and get some sun!"
1985h; found KSP when 0.18 was released.

I put maybe 100 hours in on 0.21.1 from when I discovered it and I am probably at 30 or so in 0.22

Oh and I unlocked the last level (8) of science so I can get more points on my next flight, I still have several areas at level 6 & 7 to unlock and a couple at 5 even.
I dread to think! so glad I don't have steam to quantify this for me!
I just checked steam, and its at 179 hours lol

Way too many hours.

No, I mean WAY too many.

No, more than that.

You still too low.

Let's just forget it shall we?
Around 114 hours I believe, and I just installed Kethane, so there's another 100 there.

I've averaged around 2 hours of so per day of KSP since I first got the game (obviously not consistently; some days it's been 6+ hours, most sub-2 hours) back around 0.11. That works out pretty close to 1,500 hours.
